name: from-code-to-cloud-lab
postStartCommand: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; if ! command -v k3d >/dev/null 2>&1; then curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/k3d-io/k3d/main/install.sh | bash; fi; for i in {1..60}; do if docker info >/dev/null 2>&1; then break; else echo Waiting for Docker...; sleep 2; fi; done; echo "✅ Docker ready"; k3d version || true'

name: from-code-to-cloud-lab
postCreateCommand: curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/k3d-io/k3d/main/install.sh | bash && echo '✅ k3d installed' && k3d version
